page.title: 11KIRKBURTON FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: Kirkburton First school has been a school since 1923 and the grassland which now is the school playing fields used to be someone's garden.The children who go there start just before their 5th birthday and leave when they are ten.There are 5 classes in the school and 5 full time teachers.The school has got a computer with a disc drive and runs a computer club.The computer is used to help people understand their lessons,make people work harder and it is sometimes used for fun.School starts at 9o'clock and finishes at half past 3.Altogether there are 115 children in the school.The school goes on trips to places like Lightwater Valley, Blackpool Zoo and Filey.Music teachers come in to give children lessons on their instruments.The first Kirkburton school was School House.
